title: Add TheMovieDB.org water mark.
message:
Add TheMovieDB.org water mark.

Summary:
  - This product uses the TMDb API but is not endorsed or certified by TMDb.
    Since has noncommercial purpose, all images has the TMDb watermark
    applyied over them.
  - For more information related to the API, see http://www.themoviedb.org.

title: Create recycler view containing movie posters thumnails.
message: Create recycler view containing movie posters thumnails.

title: Create RecyclerAdapter.OnItemSelectedListener interface.
message:
Create RecyclerAdapter.OnItemSelectedListener interface.

Summary:
  - Unlike AdapterView, RecyclerView.Adapter does not defines a
    OnItemSelectedListener interface.
  - Once the behavior of this interface is implemented and assigned to the
    related RecyclerAdapter subclass, it is possible to determinate which
    recycler view item was clicked and trigger a response action.
  - References:
    * Materialize Your App, by Antonio Leiva. See http://goo.gl/RxTHOH

title: Retry download for missing movie details.
message:
Retry download for missing movie details.

Summary:
Some details are not available on the movie list download. If the backdrop
image, overview, vote average are missing, a second network request by ID
is called.

title: Download movie data from server and store into SQLite database.
message: Download movie data from server and store into SQLite database.

title: Turn AbstractContentValues into a generic class.
message:
Turn AbstractContentValues into a generic class.

Summary:
In order to make the process of transform a POJO, created by Retrofit, into a
ContentValue, an abstract method method with a generic type was added to the
AbstractContentValues definition.

Thus any subclass, which is also an adapter to a SQLite table, will have to
tie the POJO to the concrete implementation, turning the SyncAdapter loosely
coupled to content provider implementation.

title: Create a proxy for communicating with Movie DB API backend.
message:
Create a proxy for communicating with Movie DB API backend.

Summary:
  - Proxy hides communication details about the REST API endpoint access.
  - Proxy also implements command pattern, which will be used by the
    SyncAdapter intance.
  - Reference:
    * Command Pattern, by Source Making. See https://goo.gl/4HkdtB.
    * Command Revisited, by Markus Voelter. See https://goo.gl/7FYf43
    * Proxy Pattern, by Source Making.  See https://goo.gl/D1A461

title: Create a content provider as a facade to the Movie DB REST API.
message:
Create a content provider as a facade to the Movie DB REST API.

Summary:
  - Create a content provider as a facade to the Movie DB REST API. The facade
    acts like a domain layer in a Android Layer Architecture design.
  - The content provider code was automatically generated using a json
    configuration.
  - Reference:
    * Architecting Android - The Clean Way?, by Fernando Cejas.
      See http://goo.gl/V8fv5b.
    * Android Contentent Provider Generator, by Benoit Lubek. See
      https://github.com/BoD/android-contentprovider-generator
    * Java generics - get class? See http://goo.gl/fAPcvf
    * Google I/O 2010 - Android REST client applications, by Viril Dobjanschi,
      at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xHXn3Kg2IQE
    * How to convert a Java object to key-value pairs. See http://goo.gl/NFIsfM
    * Map to ContentValues (Abusing Parcelable). See https://goo.gl/3f3Ooa

title: Refactor to Material Design toolbar.
message:
Refactor to Material Design toolbar.

Summary:
  - Refactor ActionBar tab layout to Material Design collapsible toolbar layout.
  - Reference:
    * Materialize Your App, by Antonio Leiva. See http://antonioleiva.com/materialize-app/.
    * How to hide/show Toolbar when list is scrolling, by Michal Z. See https://goo.gl/RWJTdW

title: Create Material Design Aquamarine Palette.
message:
Create Material Design Aquamarine Palette.

Summary:
Color palette were calculated using Material Palette. For more details,
please check https://www.materialpalette.com/.

title: Support some foreign languages.
message:
Support some foreign languages.

Summary:
Add translations to Brazilian Portuguese, Japanese, Spanish, and Swedish.

title: Create Popular Movies project.
message:

Summary:
